name: Arcade Smasher!
description:
A Challenging Platformer in which Fixie the panda must try to fix as many Arcade Boxes as possible before the time runs out. Made in 72 hours for the ScoreSpace Jam #14.

--CONTROLS--

-[W A S D] to move

-[Space] to dash into the boxes. Dash into boxes to smash them together and fix them

-[W] to ascend to the next level when the boxes are fixed

-[R] to restart (won't save your score so only recommended when bugged)

My current highscore to beat is 66
